Manage Environment
Main Success Scenario:
  1. Click on gear icon on top right of Postman GUI
  2. See environments in the Manage Environments window. 
  3. "Share Environment"
  4. "Duplicate Environment"
  5. "Download Environment"
  6. "Delete Environment"
  7. "Remove Environment from Workspace"
  8. "Edit Environment"
  
Edit Environment
Main Success Scenario:
  1. Click on environment name link
  2. "Update Environment Variable"
Alternatives:
  1a. Update Globals Environment
    1a1. Click "Globals" button at bottom right 
    1a2. "Update Environment Variable"
  
  
Update Environment Variable
Note:
  -xxx:fill in
Main Success Scenario:
  1. Change variable value
  2. Click "Update" button
  3. Click "X" at top right of Manage Environments window
  
Add Environment Variable
Note:
  -xxx:fill in
Main Success Scenario:
  1. xxx:fill in
